headline: Matt Dolan Gains Ground Ahead of Ohio Primary in Threat to Trump's Power
author: Andrew Stanton

Ohio state Senator Matt Dolan, a Republican candidate for U.S. Senate, is surging in the days leading up to the state's primary elections.
Should he eke out a surprise victory in the primary, set to take place on Tuesday, his win could threaten Trump's power over the GOP.
Whoever wins the Republican primary will be considered the favorite in the general election, as Ohio has trended red in recent years.
Dolan, who represents the suburbs near Cleveland in the state Senate, has seen a significant jump in support in the past few months.
